introduce.content:
I have 3+years of experience in developing web front-end and back-end. While participating in a project to develop web services for real-time monitoring, I have experience in dealing with various problems as , such as security issues that need to be basically observed on the web, performance issues generated by monitoring big data, and considering usability/scalability/maintenance.

In particular, i'm good at designing and developing data visualization using Chart, designing and developing common components that can be customized, asynchronous processing using framework lifecycles and Promise, and designing and developing data processing algorithms.

I has been recognized as a team member who is highly productive in development and actively proposes design for product improvement. and I will always work hard to understand and practice the importance of teamwork and communication that the team grows together by considering and reviewing the problems faced by other team members.

work_exp.task1: Web Services Front-End and Back-End Development for Real-Time Monitoring
work_exp.task2: Functional development, sophistication, and maintenance from the new development stage to the post-launch stage of the project

project.custom_dashboard_command: Develop realtime dashboards that allow users to customize per-Componet widgets, focusing on data visualization using a variety of Charts (Bar, Line, Pie, Grid, World-map, etc.)
project.traffic_monitoring_command: development and visualization of traffic transition information providing function in time zone based on realtime traffic data
project.query_logic_command: Develop logic to validation of user-configured queries and development of conversion logic to actual queries
project.pattern_semiauto_command: Development of log pattern semi-automatic classification function
project.login_mfa_command: Development of login-related features and APIs: Development of membership, login, account privileges and MFA(second SMS authentication)
project.jwt_login_session_command: Develop JWT token-based login session management processes
project.test_automation_command: Automate testing: Scripting and sharing for web monitoring performance testing to provide a performance testing environment for collecting 50+ million events
project.multilingual_command: Multilingualism-based development experience: Multilingual web service development and Multilingual function development to string logs with dynamic data values
project.data_migration_command: Data Migration: Develop DB upgrade script using Procedure to maintain existing data when significant changes in DB structure
project.custom_dashboard_command_sub: Resolve issues where multiple dashboard development requirements are consistently encountered according to a variety of user's monitoring style
project.traffic_monitoring_command_sub: Reduce user data analysis time by visually presenting relevant information about specific data
project.query_logic_command_sub: Advanced integrated-search capabilities. Maximize usability and convenience by: UI is easy + Complex parts are automatically processing by internal functions
project.pattern_semiauto_command_sub: Eliminate the inconvenience of user having to find and classify all field-value values when an Unknown log occurs
project.test_automation_command_sub: Increase probability of finding potential problems and significantly reduce test time by allowing the development team to reproduce the actual usage environment within the development team
